name: ARROW Patterns
description:
ARROW Patterns is the sequel of ARROW. This game is a travel to a unique world, with a lot of logic and fun. ARROW Patterns is an elegant and relaxing puzzle game with an enigmatic atmosphere, which will immerse you in a unique experience and make you relax while activating your brain creating strategies that will increase your IQ. This puzzle game puts you on a mental quest and tons of various logical challenges!
Challenge your brain with a game experience that pushes the limits of your logic.

In this sequel you will have to draw awesome shapes while you move the tiles. There are tons of fun shapes that will blow your mind.
How to play? Easy!, swipe to move the arrows and solve the patterns, but you can only move the arrows if their direction matches your swipe. You will also find challenges such as teleporters and rotators that will put you thinking and make this fun puzzle game a real challenge for your brain.
If you think you are smart try playing ARROW and challenge your friends to see who goes further.

Why ARROW Patterns is a game you should play?

SIMPLE: Beautiful minimal design.
CHALLENGE: Although it seems easy at the beginning, ARROW Patterns will challenge your logic like no other intelligence game created by our team.
BEAUTIFUL: A unique and relaxing music and surprisingly beautiful effects are enough to keep you connected for long hours.
FUN: Each puzzle is a unique experience.
STRATEGIC: Just swipe to move the arrows and match the pattern. With traps such as teleporters and rotators, together with the movement strategy of the arrows themselves, they will do more than challenging and fun to solve the puzzles.
FOR ALL: We have created two levels of difficulty: CASUAL and CHALLENGE, so that everyone can play this intelligent puzzle game.
